xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.15 Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika » 1.15.3 Aniyatapada » 1.15.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika
Aniyatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
451.
985Hetu aniyato dhammo hetussa aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
452.
986Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
987Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
988Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
989(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
990Hetudukamicchattaniyatattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.16 Hetuduka, Maggārammaṇattika >>
